en-US.summary: Control and monitor your smart home devices with HomeSense.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask HomeSense to turn on the living room lights
Alexa, ask HomeSense for the thermostat status
en-US.name: HomeSense
en-US.description: Monitor and control lights, thermostat, locks, and sensors via Alexa.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Test device control and status queries.
